definitions.definition: An outline , boundary or border , usually of curved shape.
examples: the low drag contour of a modern automobile

definitions.definition: A line on a map or chart delineating those points which have the same altitude or other plotted quantity : a contour line or isopleth ; ( metonymically ) the landform or its surface.
a speech sound which behaves as a single segment, but which makes an internal transition from one quality, place, or manner to another.
A general description giving the most important points.

main_definition: An outline , boundary or border , usually of curved shape.
secondary_definitions: A line on a map or chart delineating those points which have the same altitude or other plotted quantity : a contour line or isopleth ; ( metonymically ) the landform or its surface.
( linguistics ) a speech sound which behaves as a single segment, but which makes an internal transition from one quality, place, or manner to another.
( figurative ) A general description giving the most important points.
